item.title: A generalization of the Parameterized Expectations Algorithm
A Generalization of the Parameterized Expectation Algorithm
item.description: Introduction This blog post is about my work on a generalization of the Parameterized Expectations Algorithm, available here. The Parameterized Expectations Algorithm (PEA) is a classic computational approach to numerically “solve” economic models with rational expectations, i.e. finding an approximate solution.
